column4: Tourism;Stung Treng: Police at the Trapaing Kriel International Border Station sent a Russian national over the border into Laos at 12:30 pm on 17 February 2020. The foreigner was identified as ILLIA MIASNIKOV
column6: who was picked up by  Siem Reap Provincial Police on December 28
column8: in connection with visa irregularities. ------SOURCE GDI------In 2015
column9: Illia Miasnikov set up a ------Russian tourist-assistance center------ in Pattaya
column10: to act as an intermediary to help Russians communicate with police and to provide Russian-language tourist information.
